

I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '1';



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                              from whos_online
                              where session_id = 'fd15gst1metear5d857dbmpd85' and ip_address='127.0.0.1';



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select *
        from get_terms_to_filter;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter, session_counter from counter_history where startdate='20121206';



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM counter_history WHERE startdate = '20121206' AND counter = 1 AND session_counter = 1 LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter from counter;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select cd.categories_name from categories c, categories_description cd where c.parent_id = 0 and c.categories_id = cd.categories_id and cd.language_id='1' and c.categories_status=1;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from ezpages where status_header = 1 and header_sort_order > 0 order by header_sort_order, pages_title;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                          from languages 
                          order by sort_order;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select layout_box_name from layout_boxes where layout_box_location = 0 and layout_box_status= '1' and layout_template ='denim' order by layout_box_sort_order;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total  FROM (products p                          LEFT JOIN specials s on p.products_id = s.products_id                          LEFT JOIN products_description pd on p.products_id = pd.products_id )                          WHERE p.products_id = s.products_id and p.products_id = pd.products_id and p.products_status = '1'                          AND s.status = 1                          AND pd.language_id = 1                         ;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT p.products_id, p.products_image, pd.products_name,                           p.master_categories_id                          FROM (products p                          LEFT JOIN specials s on p.products_id = s.products_id                          LEFT JOIN products_description pd on p.products_id = pd.products_id )                          WHERE p.products_id = s.products_id and p.products_id = pd.products_id and p.products_status = '1'                          AND s.status = 1                          AND pd.language_id = 1                          ORDER BY s.specials_date_added DESC limit 9;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select layout_box_name from layout_boxes where layout_box_location=1 and layout_box_status=1 and layout_template ='denim' order by layout_box_sort_order;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from ezpages where status_footer = 1 and footer_sort_order > 0 order by footer_sort_order, pages_title;



I AM HERE specials
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'fd15gst1metear5d857dbmpd85';
